original_text: And he spake also unto the men of Penuel, saying, When I come again in peace, I will break down this tower.
korean_text: 기드온이 또 브누엘 사람들에게 말하여 이르되 내가 평안히 돌아올 때에 이 망대를 헐리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And he spake also unto the men of Penuel
When I come again in peace
I will break down this tower
